p.e:
[0] - EEPROM (BIOS, BOOTDRIVE, ETC)
[0][0] - Type (ANYSEMBLY or BITLAND PROG. LANG.)

[1] - CPU
[1][0] - Name (ex. company.gen.modelnum)
[1][1] - Cores (less than or equal to 8)
[1][2] - Maximum Tasks per Core
[1][3] - RAM/Memory requirement (in bytes)

[2] - RAM
[2][0] - Name (ex company.modelnum)
[2][1] - Size in 8-bit bytes (0-256 each) (max: 2048)
[2][2] - Bits Written/Read per second (min: 8)

[3] - GPU
[3][0] - Name (ex. company.gen.modelnum)
[3][1] - VRAM size in 8-bit bytes (1024 or higher)
[3][2] - Compatible Screen color range (in bit-depth, ex. 8 = 256)
[3][3] - Compatible Screen resolution range (in pixels)

[4] - I/O (Input/Output)
[4][0] - # of ports
[4][1-?] - Device ID (ex. "screen", "keyboard", "mouse")
[4][1-?][0] - # of on/off pins
[4][1-?][1] - Manufacturer Name

[5] - STORAGE
[5][0] - Size in 8-bit bytes (min 512)
